items.content_html: Pre-ReactJS: A lightweight, powerful library to create single page web applications in VanillaJS with features like component-based architecture, one-time server call for static content, automatic hash-routing and dom manipulations. Simplify your development journey with Pre-ReactJS! 🚀✨ Ideal for indie and hobby projects. Live example below
